subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “hole; cavity” > “penetrating; thorough; zero”
: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*dwa(ː)ŋ||hole; orifice; cave; pit; well}}. Cognate with {{cog|my|တွင်း}}, {{cog|bo|དོང}} and {{cog|kac|kha-thung|kha-'''thung'''|well, pit}}.
